title: Kentucky bourbon industry faces crisis as European tariff looms | Wdrb-video | wdrb.com
text:
Kentucky bourbon industry faces crisis as European tariff looms
- Updated
Overseas markets are critical for the bourbon industry’s growth, as 95% of the world’s bourbon is produced right here in the Commonwealth.
